objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1A1A1A'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#333333'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGrad' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F57C00' stop-opacity='0.3'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F57C00' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFA726'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E65100'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='320' fill='url(#circleGrad)' stroke='#F57C00' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='150' fill='url(#accentGrad)' stroke='#FF9800' stroke-width='2'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M100,200 L200,250 L150,350 Z' fill='#FF9800'/><path d='M900,800 L1000,850 L950,950 Z' fill='#FF9800'/><path d='M200,900 L300,950 L250,1050 Z' fill='#FF9800'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='30' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='880' cy='780' r='25' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='300' cy='650' r='40' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='750' cy='150' r='20' fill='#FF9800'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><rect x='0' y='400' width='1080' height='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='0' y='600' width='1080' height='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='0' y='800' width='1080' height='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g></svg>

objects.text: • PREMIUM CHROME DESIGN • EXCLUSIVE STYLE • LIMITED STOCK

product_details.name: Urban Fusion High-Top Sneaker Boots | Premium Chrome-Orange Limited Edition
product_details.description:
• Striking metallic orange and white color gradient design
• High-top athletic boot hybrid construction for versatile style
• Premium reflective surface treatment with modern aesthetic
• Durable rubber sole with intricate traction pattern
• Heavy-duty orange laces with metallic eyelets
• Padded collar for enhanced comfort and support
• Sleek modern silhouette perfect for streetwear fashion
• Water-resistant outer material
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Unique transparent design elements on upper portion
• Perfect blend of athletic functionality and urban style
• Available in exclusive chrome-orange colorway

banner_details:
This banner features a high-impact promotional design centered around a pair of urban sneaker boots. The background utilizes a dark diagonal gradient enhanced with geometric shapes and soft light accents to create visual depth. A highlighted circular frame encloses the product image, which is placed prominently in the center. The text element with ID `tagline` declares a bold promotional message in a striking orange hue. Just below, the `heading` text introduces the product with clear, uppercase white font. Supporting this is the `subheading` text providing an incentive message in orange. A large circular price tag (`price`) is positioned on the right in a gradient orange. The bottom area includes a `description` listing product features in white, as well as a vibrant orange `cta_background` housing the clear `cta` call-to-action. This layout combines sharp typography and warm accent tones to drive user urgency and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #1A1A1A → #333333 (dark grey)
- Accent Orange: #FF9800, #F57C00, #E65100
- Text: #FFFFFF (white), #000000 (black for CTA)
- Highlight Elements: Gradient mix of #FFA726 and #E65100
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and dynamic color palette dominated by shades of orange, white, and brown. Burnt orange (#EF7C2E) is prominently used on the toe cap, laces, and outlines, creating a striking contrast with clean white (#FFFFFF) base areas, which emphasizes the shoe's structure. Dark brown (#5C3A21) accents inside and in the reflected shadows add depth, while a warm golden hue (#FDBA4F) highlights inner contours for a glowing, energetic appeal. The colors are smoothly blended with realistic reflections and lighting effects, emphasizing movement and style. Ideal banner colors: Burnt Orange (#EF7C2E), White (#FFFFFF), Brown (#5C3A21), Golden (#FDBA4F).
